name: CEREBRAL PALSY FOUNDATION
description: Patient advocacy organization focusing on cerebral palsy
sampleDescriptions: FY23 appropriations for cerebral palsy research and education programs

Appropriations funding request of $2 million for the establishment of a National Cerebral Palsy Program at the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC). Request for report language in the Fisc
